pergasha-party-overview.EnablePlayerAcce: Grant Players access to the overview?
Allows or disallows players to access the Party window to see the stats of every player on the current scene, too
pergasha-party-overview.EnableTooltip.Hi: Enables or disables tooltips when hovering over tokens
pergasha-party-overview.EnablePlayerAcce: Enables or disables tooltips for players, but only for tokens they own.
pergasha-party-overview.TooltipFontSizeI: Set the font size for tooltips in pixels.
